title: The Barefoot Indian
description: Bridget Jones meets Illusions and The Alchemist. Fresh and gripping, accessible and entertaining, it describes situations that any modern woman would recognise, with spiritual wisdom woven in.An ordinary woman is intrigued when she sees an extraordinary job advertised. It is for the position of Messiah/Messiahress which she suspects might be a recruitment campaign for a reality TV show. However, she feels compelled to apply for the job and goes for an interview at the Head Office where she soon realises that it isnâ€™t a spoof when she comes face to face with all the great prophets and philosophers who have made an impact on the world. She embarks upon a journey of self discovery which at every step is rewarding beyond her wildest dreams.
author: Julia Heywood
